[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Consensus integration] [Event ordering] Is the ordering of UriMutation events deterministic across all validators, or can different event orderings cause state divergence? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Consensus integration] [Event commitment] Are UriMutation events included in the block commitment hash, or can events be modified without affecting consensus? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [State machine] [Event replay protection] Is there a mechanism to prevent replaying historical UriMutation events during state synchronization or node recovery? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [State machine] [Event atomicity] If a transaction emits multiple UriMutation events but later reverts, are all events properly rolled back? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [State machine] [Deterministic execution] Do all validators process UriMutation events identically, or can platform-specific string handling cause divergence? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Field: creator] [Signature verification] Is the creator address verified to have signed the transaction emitting the event, or can unauthorized addresses emit events? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Event data] [Hash collisions] Can two different UriMutation events produce the same hash, allowing event deduplication attacks? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Event data] [Merkle tree inclusion] Are events included in Merkle trees for proof verification, or can events be omitted from proofs? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [BCS encoding] [Canonical form] Does BCS encoding guarantee canonical representation, or can multiple encodings of the same event exist? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Event verification] [Proof construction] Can light clients verify UriMutation events without downloading full blocks, or are there proof size issues? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Version compatibility] [Struct evolution] If new fields are added to UriMutation in future versions, will old events deserialize correctly? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Version compatibility] [Backward compatibility] Can new validator nodes process events emitted by old validator nodes with different UriMutation struct definitions? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Protocol upgrades] [Feature flag races] During the module_event_migration feature rollout, can race conditions cause events to be emitted in both V1 and V2 formats? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Protocol upgrades] [Migration safety] Is there a safe migration path from V1 to V2 events that prevents event loss or duplication? (High)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Breaking changes] [Deprecation strategy] If UriMutation is deprecated in favor of a new event type, how will historical events remain accessible? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Memory usage] [String allocation] Can repeated allocation and deallocation of large String fields cause memory fragmentation affecting validator performance? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Memory usage] [Reference counting] If String fields use Arc or Rc internally, can circular references cause memory leaks? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [CPU usage] [UTF-8 validation] Does deserializing strings with invalid UTF-8 sequences cause excessive CPU usage during validation? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Storage] [Event retention] Are UriMutation events stored indefinitely, or is there a pruning mechanism to prevent unbounded storage growth? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/types/src/account_config/events/uri_mutation.rs] [Network bandwidth] [Event propagation] Can large UriMutation events consume excessive bandwidth during block propagation affecting network performance? (Low)
